Method Detail

getAction

static ScheduleDriver.Action getAction()
                                throws java.io.IOException
Gets the next action issued at the terminal.

Returns:
Action issued at terminal. If three incorrect attempts are made, returns quit.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is an error in reading the action.

                throws java.io.IOException
Starts or restarts the simulation from scratch.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - If there is an error reading input from terminal.
